page.title: 14Sunday Morning in Tremorfa
page.content: We get up in the morning at about 8a.m. except my dad,he gets up at about 9.30.He then has his breakfast of bacon ,egg and fried tomatoes.We have cornflakes or toast.Then we get washed and dressed for church and Sunday School.My father goes out at 11.30 and he comes back at 3.00 and has his dinner.We come out of Sunday School at 12.15 and then we feed the dog,the cat, the rabbit and the fish.Then we have something to eat ourselves.We sometimes watch a video tape or a film on television.When my father comes in and has his dinner my brother and I call for our friends and go out together.When we get in again at about 7.00 we have our tea and then we go to bed.
